title: Dr. Scott Hahn: Signs of Life (Unabridged Audiobook + epub/mobi)
description:
(I had the first torrent of this audiobook removed because the files were corrupted and wouldn't fully seed. If you tried downloading it on 11/29/2014, you'll have to start over with this new torrent.)



Signs of Life: 40 Catholic Customs and Their Biblical Roots

In the appealing conversational tone that has won him millions of devoted readers, Scott Hahn presents the basic tenets of Church teachings, clears up common misconceptions about specific rituals and traditions, and responds thoughtfully to the objections raised about them. Each chapter concludes with loving, good-natured, inspiring advice on applying the Church's wisdom to everyday life.


00. Introduction
 
    Part I - Life Begins
 
01. HOLY WATER
02. THE SIGN OF THE CROSS
03. BAPTISM
04. THE MASS
05. GUARDIAN ANGELS

    Part II - Life Times
 
06. THE CHURCHÃ¢â‚¬â„¢S CALENDAR
07. LENT AND EASTER
08. ADVENT AND CHRISTMAS
09. NOVENAS

    Part III - A Day in the Life
 
10. POSTURE
11. MORNING OFFERING
12. PRAYERS OF ASPIRATION
13. THE ANGELUS
14. GRACE AT MEALS
15. EXAMINATION OF CONSCIENCE

    Part IV - Life Lessons
 
16. BIBLE STUDY
17. SPIRITUAL READING
18. RETREAT

    Part V - Stages of Life
 
19. CONFIRMATION
20. MARRIAGE
21. PRIESTHOOD
22. ANOINTING OF THE SICK

    Part VI - Spice of Life
 
23. INCENSE
24. CANDLES
25. SACRED IMAGES
26. RELICS
27. FASTING AND MORTIFICATION

    Part VII - Abundant Life
 
28. CONFESSION
29. INDULGENCES
30. INTERCESSION OF THE SAINTS
31. PILGRIMAGE
32. THE PRESENCE OF GOD
33. ALMSGIVING

    Part VIII - Love of My Life
 
34. DEVOTION TO THE TRINITY
35. THE ROSARY
36. SCAPULARS AND MEDALS
37. MENTAL PRAYER
38. REVERENCE FOR THE TABERNACLE

    Part IX - Life Goes On
 
39. PREPARATION FOR DEATH
40. PRAYERS FOR THE DEAD

41. EPILOGUE



42 MP3s divided by chapter 

Total Length: 06:53:55

The eBook is also included in a ZIP file in EPUB and MOBI formats.
